T02D2995:57a-0: @57a * // dpal rdo rje can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2995:57a-1: gzungs sngags kyi sbyor ba ma grub pa rnams grub
T02D2995:57a-2: par byed pa'i las kyi mtha' rdzogs par byed pa'i
T02D2995:57a-3: sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor
T02D2995:57a-4: dpa' bo gcig pa bzhengs la rin po che'i bum
T02D2995:57a-5: pa'i nang du 'dod pa'i lha'i gzugs ra gan la
T02D2995:57a-6: bsgar ba sa la gzhug go //
T02D2995:57b-0: chu sna sum @57b cu rtsa lnga dang /
T02D2995:57b-1: sman sna dang rin po che'i grangs kyang de tsam
T02D2995:57b-2: gcig btsal la gtso bo'i bsnyen pa ji tsam rigs
T02D2995:57b-3: pa byas la rgyud klag pa dang /
T02D2995:57b-4: mchod pa'i bye brag ji ltar rigs pa dang bstod pa bya'o //
T02D2995:57b-5: de nas rang gis gang 'dod pa'i sgrub pa ci
T02D2995:57b-6: rigs par byas la las la sbyar ba'i cho ga
T02D2995:57b-7: lan brgya rtsa brgyad dang stong phrag gcig byas la
T02D2995:57b-8: / 'dod pa'i lha'i sku'i thugs kar rdo rje rnam
T02D2995:57b-9: 'joms kyi mdzod spu nas 'od 'phros pas kha dog
T02D2995:57b-10: ji ltar mos pa lcags kyu'i rnam pa dang 'dra
T02D2995:57b-11: ba byung la yi dam ci 'dra ba de grangs
T02D2995:57b-12: med pa de'i thugs kar gzhug go //
T02D2995:57b-13: de nas lha aar la gtad pa'i cho ga bya'o //
T02D2995:57b-14: mandal dmar po'i steng du gtor ma lnga byas te /
T02D2995:57b-15: de dag re re'i nang du snying po gang yang
T02D2995:57b-16: rung ba bong bu'i khrag gis gro ga la bris
T02D2995:57b-17: la gtor ma'i 'og tu bcug la khrag dang 'o
T02D2995:57b-19: yi dam gyi snying po gang yin pa de mas bzlog la stong phrag bdun bzlas te /
T02D2995:57b-20: las ma grub pa ni mchog yin no zhes lan
T02D2995:57b-21: bdun brjod pas gtor ma de dag dur khrod du
T02D2995:57b-22: khyer la dong brus la dong du blugs la dur
T02D2995:57b-24: de dag kun gyi 'og tu ci 'dod pa'i don de las la sbyar la gzhag go //
T02D2995:57b-25: de nas bum pa'i nang gi yi dam gyi gzugs
T02D2995:57b-26: la ye shes sems dpa' lan brgya rtsa brgyad bcug
T02D2995:57b-27: la rang gi 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba btab
T02D2995:57b-28: ste / snying po stong phrag gcig bzlas la spyan
T02D2995:57b-29: drang pa dang mchod pa dang bstod pa rang gi
T02D2995:57b-30: gzhung dang mthun par byas la /
T02D2995:57b-31: mchod pa dang bstod pa gtor ma brgya rtsa brgyad
T02D2995:57b-32: byas na sngar sngags kyi lan grangs dang dus las
T02D2995:57b-33: skyol nam grub pa rnams grub ste /
T02D2995:57b-34: de ltar byas na bdag nyid bum pa'i chus khrus byas te /
T02D2995:57b-35: bdag gi lus khro bo grangs med par sprul la
T02D2995:57b-36: de dag rnams kyi lus la sprul pa'i khro chung
T02D2995:57b-37: grangs med pa spros nas snang pa thams cad khro
T02D2995:57b-38: bor dmigs la / khro bo de dag gis 'dod
T02D2995:57b-39: pa'i don gang yin pa nges par ster ba dang
T02D2995:57b-40: bor dmigs la / / bdag nyid kyi las dang bag chags thams cad rgyun gcad de /
T02D2995:57b-41: nyes skyon dang dri ma thams cad dag bar dmigs so //
T02D2995:58a-0: de'i rjes la khams gsum gyis bsdus pa'i @58a * //
T02D2995:58a-1: sems can rnams kyi las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang rgyun gcad de /
T02D2995:58a-2: til gyi 'bru tsam yang ma lus par dag par dmigs /
T02D2995:58a-3: 'dod pa'i don ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du khams
T02D2995:58a-4: gsum du gtogs pa'i gzugs dang gzugs med pa rnams
T02D2995:58a-5: kyis kyang khyod kyi sngags nges par 'grub par lha
T02D2995:58a-6: che ge mos gyis shig par 'dod pa'i don la
T02D2995:58a-7: gsol ba gdab par dmigs so //
T02D2995:58a-8: de nas khams gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams
T02D2995:58a-9: la gtor ma ro mchog brgya dang ldan pa sbyin
T02D2995:58a-10: par bya'o // de nas smon lam gdab /
T02D2995:58a-13: yi ge brgya pa yang 'bum phrag gcig gis bshags so //
T02D2995:58a-14: gzungs sngags kyi las ma grub pa rnams grub par byed pa rdo rje be con zhes bya ba /
